review: Saves me $200 a month on my cable bill. We were only watching less than a handful of channels from our cable provider. This allows us to keep up with the few shows we follow (which we would have to DVR anyway so the one day delay doesn't make a difference) and my toddler can still have her Disney shows. I like that we can watch movies and since we are prime members there are many out there for free to watch. Glad we purchased this! Works great with no lag. Easy to use. Couldn't ask for anything better at this time. We had roku and hated it. This is much better.
author: Natasha Holcomb "Love Great Deals"

review: Bought two Fire TV--nice; hesitant about getting a little stick. It surprised me!

review: I was considering purchasing a smart tv but was on the fence about replacing a tv that worked well. Instead, we decided to give the Amazon Fire stick a chance and we are glad we did.I can easily access Amazon Prime videos, listen to music, watch Hulu or Netflix. It comes with a remote so I don't have to use my computer which is nice. I use it more than my chromecast because of this.I wish it came with the voice remote but for the price, it can't be beat.
